snippet.title: Grave Shadows Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Now up on itch.io, Grave Shadows v1.1! 
Play as Colton Graves, a former detective turned private eye after an accident left him between life and death. Now, empowered by his ability to merge with shadows, Graves seeks vengeance against the crime family that murdered his partner, staged the accident, and threatens the power balance of the cold war.

You can download Grave Shadows at
https://grant-doney.itch.io/grave-shadows

Follow us on Twitter @GraveShadows
